title: UnProjection, HyperNP
text: Use deep learning (encoder-decoder) mdoels to emulate projection methods (UMAP, tSNE, etc.) and perform inverse projection

title: Kyrix, Kyrix-S, Kyrix-J
text: Optimized database + visualization systems that enables highly interactive web-based pan-zoom visualizations

title: Bayesian Reasoning
text: Improving medical risk communicatoin using phrasing, visualization, and interactions while taking into account the user's spatial ability.

title: Cognitive Bias
text: Studies of how cognitive biases can influence a user's ability to effectively make use of progressively updating visualization

title: NeuralCubes
text: NeuralCube uses a deep learning model to replace databases for interactive visualizations with minimum loss in accuracy

title: Data Augmentation
text: CAVA is an visualization tool that helps a user perform data augmentation interactively by extracting data from knowledge graphs

title: Multi-View Composition
text: A study of the composition of multi-view visualizations and a tool that recommends multiview visualization layouts

title: Analytic Provenance
text: Analytic provenance is the analysis of user's interactions to understand the user's analysis goals and predict their future actions

title: NN Architecture Search
text: We introduce REMAP, a system that helps a user perform guided search of neural network architectures

title: AutoML + VIS
text: A visual analytics system (Snowcat) that integrates AutoML for model construction, comparison, and selection.
